description: Two children, aged about 10, make a valuable discovery as they build a shelter in their garden.
title: Coronavirus: French brothers strike gold under lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: French brothers strike gold under lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Moreover, the price of gold has increased due to the coronavirus pandemic. "We are going to wait for the price of gold to rise a little more," Mr Rouillac said. "They could get at least 100,000 euros."
